#include <cstdio>
#include <cstdlib>
#define REPEAT(token, num) for (token = 0; token < num; token++)
typedef signed char byte;
using namespace std;
//#define DEBUG
#ifdef DEBUG
#define PRINTF printf
#else
#define PRINTF(...) 1
#endif

typedef byte test_cases;
typedef unsigned long long string_sum;

int main() {
    test_cases numTestCases, i;
    string_sum sum = 0;
    size_t length;
    char store;
    scanf("%hhi", &numTestCases);
    getchar();
    REPEAT(i, numTestCases) {
        length = sum = 0;
        store = getchar();
        while (store != '\n') {
            length++;
            sum += store;
            store = getchar();
        }
        putchar(sum/length);
        putchar('\n');
    }
    exit(0);
}
